short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI button for the automatic generation of comments on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn AI Comment Assistant üåü

Product Description

LinkedIn AI Comment Assistant is a powerful Chrome extension specifically designed to assist you in generating automatic and context-aware comments for LinkedIn posts. It leverages the advanced OpenAI API to create relevant and engaging comments that enhance your interactions on LinkedIn.

Key Features üöÄ

Automatic Comment Generation: Automatically generates comments based on the content of LinkedIn posts and existing comments.
Easy Integration: Seamless integration with LinkedIn to generate comments directly within the platform.
Personalized Responses: Comments are tailored to match the tone and language of the post, enabling authentic interactions.
Installation and Setup üì•

Install the Extension: Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Enter API Key:
Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Enter your OpenAI API key in the input field and save it.
Reload LinkedIn Page: Reload the LinkedIn page to activate the extension.
Usage üí°

Open LinkedIn: Navigate to a LinkedIn post you want to comment on.
Generate Comment: Click the "Generate AI Comment" button in the comment section of the post. The generated comment will be displayed, and you can edit and publish it.
Additional Information ‚ÑπÔ∏è

This extension is available under the MIT license. For questions or issues, please contact the developer.

Usage Notes üõ†Ô∏è

Please note that this extension is primarily intended for testing and experimentation. Continuous use may lead to LinkedIn being flooded with AI-generated content. Use the extension responsibly and limit its use to testing purposes.

Important: You must have credits on your OpenAI account for this extension to function.

About Me üåü

I am an AI Consultant and Developer specializing in optimizing and automating processes for e-commerce companies. I support the development and implementation of generative AI solutions and offer fine-tuning services for prompts. For more information, visit https://www.manuel-fuss.de and LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/manuel-fu%C3%9F-964876167/.
